actions.command: /scoreboard objectives add interaction_cd dummy "Fox Origin Interaction CD"
/execute as @a unless entity @s[scores={interaction_cd=0..}] run scoreboard players set @s interaction_cd 0
/execute as @a[scores={interaction_cd=1..}] run scoreboard players remove @s interaction_cd 20
/title @s actionbar {"translate":"fox.trusted","fallback":"§dWholesome Interaction! You are now trusted by them"}

/tellraw @s {"text":"","extra":[{"translate":"fox.feeder","fallback":"§dYou granted %s §bthe fox§r§d with berries as a little treat :3","with":[{"selector":"@e[tag=interacted,limit=1,sort=nearest]","color":"aqua"}]}]}

/tellraw @s {"text":"","extra":[{"translate":"fox.hug","fallback":"§dYou gave %s §dthe little critter a little hug :3","with":[{"selector":"@e[tag=interacted,limit=1,sort=nearest]","color":"aqua"}]}]}
